title: Received permanent account suspension
body: Says to check your verified email address for details, but I never received a email.

replies.body: The same thing happened to me I never received any email confirmation or even any warnings on my account

Hey there,

Are you sure you're checking the email address associated with your account? This can be found [here](https://account.leagueoflegends.com/oce/en/protect).

If you're sure you're checking the correct email and the email has not gone to your spam/junk folder, feel free to [submit a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/requests/new) to receive details regarding your ban from Player Support.
